Rune.Name: Rune Name
Rune.NoRunes: No runes created yet. Add your first rune to get started!
Rune.DescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the effects and properties of this rune...

Calculator.Description: Use the power of ether to enhance your Pathfinder 2E dice rolls.
Calculator.Hint: Equipped runes can be activated at any time. Your character's ether power will be automatically added to compatible rolls.

Errors.NoActor: No actor selected to make the roll.
Errors.NotEnoughEther: Not enough ether to activate this rune!

Warnings.NotPF2E: This module is designed to work with the Pathfinder 2E system. Some features may not be available.

EtherRegenOnRest.Name: Ether Regeneration on Rest
EtherRegenOnRest.Hint: If enabled, ether will be fully restored when the character rests.

ShowEtherInChat.Name: Show Ether in Chat
ShowEtherInChat.Hint: If enabled, displays ether information in roll messages in chat.
